content.rendered:
An Iconic Hotel Since 1998

About The Hotel

The forest haven of warmth, tranquility and restoration

Welcome to CozyStay Inn & Resort

In the Heart of the Banff Park, Outstanding Views

Nestled in the heart of the Pacific Islands resort, on the edge of a tranquil and beautiful Garden Island, CozyStay is a haven of warmth, tranquility and rejuvenation. Bathed in brilliant sunshine and clear skies, it offers stunning views of palm-lined beaches and gorgeous coral reefs.

Enjoy Your Stay At The Hotel

Spend your comfortable holiday in the heart of the beautiful forest

Discover Our Services & Facilities

All the Essentials for a Cozy and Comfortable Stay

State-of-the-art amenities include a dramatic double-story loft lounge, spectacular rooftop lounge, Technogym fitness center, media corner, and a gracious 24/7 resident services team.
